title: `eq_any()` is currently unsupported for `CombineDsl` subqueries
body:
<!--
If you want to report a bug, we added some points below which help us track down the problem faster.
-->

## Setup

### Versions

- **Rust:** rustc 1.66.0-nightly (6b3ede3f7 2022-10-13)
- **Diesel:** 2.0.2
- **Database:** sqlite
- **Operating System** Linux

### Feature Flags

- **diesel:** = { version = "2.0.2", features = ["sqlite", "chrono"] }

## Problem Description

Using `eq_any()` fails in this code snippet:
```
 use crate::schema::*;

    users::dsl::users.distinct().filter(
        users::id.eq_any(
            topics::dsl::topics.select(topics::user_id).filter(topics::id.eq(t_id)).union(
                posts::dsl::posts
                    .select(posts::user_id)
                    .filter(posts::topic_id.eq(t_id)),
            ),
        ),
    ).load::<User>(&mut connection)
```

With this error:
```
nix-shell â¯ cargo check                                                                                                                                                                                                                          impure â„
    Checking vpub-rust v0.1.0 (/home/pinpox/code/github.com/pinpox/vpub-rust)
warning: unused import: `crate::schema::posts`
  --> src/models/user.rs:22:5
   |
22 | use crate::schema::posts;
   |     ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
   |
   = note: `#[warn(unused_imports)]` on by default

warning: unused import: `crate::schema::topics`
  --> src/models/user.rs:23:5
   |
23 | use crate::schema::topics;
   |     ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

error[E0277]: `diesel::query_builder::combination_clause::CombinationClause<diesel::query_builder::combination_clause::Union, diesel::query_builder::combination_clause::Distinct, SelectStatement<FromClause<schema::topics::table>, diesel::query_builder::select_clause::SelectClause<schema::topics::columns::user_id>, diesel::query_builder::distinct_clause::NoDistinctClause, diesel::query_builder::where_clause::WhereClause<expression::grouped::Grouped<expression::operators::Eq<schema::topics::columns::id, expression::bound::Bound<diesel::sql_types::Integer, i32>>>>>, SelectStatement<FromClause<schema::posts::table>, diesel::query_builder::select_clause::SelectClause<schema::posts::columns::user_id>, diesel::query_builder::distinct_clause::NoDistinctClause, diesel::query_builder::where_clause::WhereClause<expression::grouped::Grouped<expression::operators::Eq<schema::posts::columns::topic_id, expression::bound::Bound<diesel::sql_types::Integer, i32>>>>>>` is not an iterator
   --> src/models/user.rs:107:19
    |
107 |         users::id.eq_any(
    |                   ^^^^^^ `diesel::query_builder::combination_clause::CombinationClause<diesel::query_builder::combination_clause::Union, diesel::query_builder::combination_clause::Distinct, SelectStatement<FromClause<schema::topics::table>, diesel::query_builder::select_clause::SelectClause<schema::topics::columns::user_id>, diesel::query_builder::distinct_clause::NoDistinctClause, diesel::query_builder::where_clause::WhereClause<expression::grouped::Grouped<expression::operators::Eq<schema::topics::columns::id, expression::bound::Bound<diesel::sql_types::Integer, i32>>>>>, SelectStatement<FromClause<schema::posts::table>, diesel::query_builder::select_clause::SelectClause<schema::posts::columns::user_id>, diesel::query_builder::distinct_clause::NoDistinctClause, diesel::query_builder::where_clause::WhereClause<expression::grouped::Grouped<expression::operators::Eq<schema::posts::columns::topic_id, expression::bound::Bound<diesel::sql_types::Integer, i32>>>>>>` is not an iterator
    |
    = help: the trait `Iterator` is not implemented for `diesel::query_builder::combination_clause::CombinationClause<diesel::query_builder::combination_clause::Union, diesel::query_builder::combination_clause::Distinct, SelectStatement<FromClause<schema::topics::table>, diesel::query_builder::select_clause::SelectClause<schema::topics::columns::user_id>, diesel::query_builder::distinct_clause::NoDistinctClause, diesel::query_builder::where_clause::WhereClause<expression::grouped::Grouped<expression::operators::Eq<schema::topics::columns::id, expression::bound::Bound<diesel::sql_types::Integer, i32>>>>>, SelectStatement<FromClause<schema::posts::table>, diesel::query_builder::select_clause::SelectClause<schema::posts::columns::user_id>, diesel::query_builder::distinct_clause::NoDistinctClause, diesel::query_builder::where_clause::WhereClause<expression::grouped::Grouped<expression::operators::Eq<schema::posts::columns::topic_id, expression::bound::Bound<diesel::sql_types::Integer, i32>>>>>>`
    = help: the following other types implement trait `expression::array_comparison::AsInExpression<T>`:
              BoxedSelectStatement<'a, ST, QS, DB, GB>
              SelectStatement<F, S, D, W, O, LOf, G, H, LC>
    = note: required for `diesel::query_builder::combination_clause::CombinationClause<diesel::query_builder::combination_clause::Union, diesel::query_builder::combination_clause::Distinct, SelectStatement<FromClause<schema::topics::table>, diesel::query_builder::select_clause::SelectClause<schema::topics::columns::user_id>, diesel::query_builder::distinct_clause::NoDistinctClause, diesel::query_builder::where_clause::WhereClause<expression::grouped::Grouped<expression::operators::Eq<schema::topics::columns::id, expression::bound::Bound<diesel::sql_types::Integer, i32>>>>>, SelectStatement<FromClause<schema::posts::table>, diesel::query_builder::select_clause::SelectClause<schema::posts::columns::user_id>, diesel::query_builder::distinct_clause::NoDistinctClause, diesel::query_builder::where_clause::WhereClause<expression::grouped::Grouped<expression::operators::Eq<schema::posts::columns::topic_id, expression::bound::Bound<diesel::sql_types::Integer, i32>>>>>>` to implement `IntoIterator`
    = note: required for `diesel::query_builder::combination_clause::CombinationClause<diesel::query_builder::combination_clause::Union, diesel::query_builder::combination_clause::Distinct, SelectStatement<FromClause<schema::topics::table>, diesel::query_builder::select_clause::SelectClause<schema::topics::columns::user_id>, diesel::query_builder::distinct_clause::NoDistinctClause, diesel::query_builder::where_clause::WhereClause<expression::grouped::Grouped<expression::operators::Eq<schema::topics::columns::id, expression::bound::Bound<diesel::sql_types::Integer, i32>>>>>, SelectStatement<FromClause<schema::posts::table>, diesel::query_builder::select_clause::SelectClause<schema::posts::columns::user_id>, diesel::query_builder::distinct_clause::NoDistinctClause, diesel::query_builder::where_clause::WhereClause<expression::grouped::Grouped<expression::operators::Eq<schema::posts::columns::topic_id, expression::bound::Bound<diesel::sql_types::Integer, i32>>>>>>` to implement `expression::array_comparison::AsInExpression<diesel::sql_types::Text>`

For more information about this error, try `rustc --explain E0277`.
warning: `vpub-rust` (lib) generated 2 warnings
error: could not compile `vpub-rust` due to previous error; 2 warnings emitted
```

@weiznich mentioned over on Matrix that there needs to be added a imple simlar to [this one](https://github.com/diesel-rs/diesel/blob/5dc6b2a9e681c2bf0880b9b75c84edd784e8f221/diesel/src/expression/array_comparison.rs#L205-L217) for [this type](https://github.com/diesel-rs/diesel/blob/5dc6b2a9e681c2bf0880b9b75c84edd784e8f221/diesel/src/query_builder/combination_clause.rs#L26) for this to be fixed 

### What are you trying to accomplish?

I'm trying to use diesel's DSL to "translate" this query
```
select * from users where id in (select user_id from topics where id = ? union select user_id from posts where topic_id = ?)
```
### What is the expected output?

The users from the users table, who's ID matches either:
- user_id from the topic from the topics table with id = ?
- user_id from any of the posts of the posts table that have topic_id = ?

### What is the actual output?
See error above

### Are you seeing any additional errors?
Only the one above

### Steps to reproduce

Try to run above code snippet with a sqlite DB with these migrations: https://github.com/pinpox/rust-forum/tree/00f5e3d167d839c8280ea1182ecbb853e767d2da/migrations

<!--
Please include as much of your codebase as needed to reproduce the error.  If the relevant files are large, please consider linking to a public repository or a [Gist](https://gist.github.com/). This includes normally the following parts:

* The exact code where your hit the problem
* Relevant parts your schema, so any `table!` macro calls required for the
* Any other type definitions involved in the code, which produces your problem
-->

## Checklist

- [x] I have already looked over the [issue tracker](https://github.com/diesel-rs/diesel/issues)  and the [disussion forum](https://github.com/diesel-rs/diesel/discussions)  for similar possible closed issues.
<!--
If you are unsure if your issue is a duplicate of an existing issue please link the issue in question here
--> 
- [x] This issue can be reproduced on Rust's stable channel. (Your issue will be
  closed if this is not the case)
- [x] This issue can be reproduced without requiring a third party crate

<!--
Thank you for your submission!  You're helping make Diesel more robust ðŸŽ‰

We'll try to respond as quickly as possible.
-->
